sampleInterval.title: Sampling Interval (ms)
sampleInterval.description: The interval at which to record data points.

automaticRecording.title: Always recording in background
automaticRecording.description: Toggle to enable or disable constant recording of polar data.

automaticRecordingFile.title: File name for automatic recording polar
automaticRecordingFile.description: The interval at which to record data points.

useStdDev.title: Use standard deviation for filters
useStdDev.description: If enabled, filters use standard deviation instead of simple average ratio comparisons. The threshold fields act as z-score limits.

useCogThreshold.title: Filter the recorded points by COG stability
useCogThreshold.description: Toggle to enable or disable the point filtering based on COG stability.

minLenghtValidData.title: Minimum time on course (seconds)
minLenghtValidData.description: The minimum time in the same course to consider the values are valid to record.

sameCourseAngleOffset.title: Accepted course variation to consider stable course (degrees)

useTwdThreshold.title: Filter the recorded points by TWD stability
useTwdThreshold.description: Toggle to enable or disable the point filtering based on TWD stability.

minStableTwdTime.title: Minimum time with constant TWD
minStableTwdTime.description: The minimum time with the same TWD to consider the values are valid to record.

sameTwdAngleOffset.title: Accepted TWD variation to consider stable wind direction (degrees)

useVmgThreshold.title: Filter the recorded points by current STW to polar recorded ratio
useVmgThreshold.description: Toggle to enable or disable the point filtering based on current STW to polar recorded to detect sudden speed changes.

vmgRatioThresholdUp.title: Upper threshold for STW to VMG ratio
vmgRatioThresholdUp.description: Ignored if standard deviation is used.

vmgRatioThresholdDown.title: Lower threshold for STW to VMG ratio
vmgRatioThresholdDown.description: Ignored if standard deviation is used.

useAvgSpeedThreshold.title: Filter the recorded points by deviations from average STW
useAvgSpeedThreshold.description: Toggle to enable or disable the point filtering based on the average speed in the specified time window to detect sudden speed changes.

avgSpeedTimeWindow.title: Speed average time window (s)
avgSpeedTimeWindow.description: Time window (in seconds) to calculate average speed.

avgSpeedThresholdUp.title: Speed filter threshold (z-score or ratio)
avgSpeedThresholdUp.description: If standard deviation is enabled, this is the maximum allowed z-score. Otherwise, it's the upper ratio threshold.

avgSpeedThresholdDown.title: Lower speed ratio threshold
avgSpeedThresholdDown.description: Ignored if standard deviation is enabled.

useAvgTwsThreshold.title: Filter by TWS deviation from average
useAvgTwsThreshold.description: Enable filtering based on the average True Wind Speed over a time window.

avgTwsTimeWindow.title: TWS average time window (s)
avgTwsTimeWindow.description: Time window in seconds to calculate average TWS.

avgTwsThresholdUp.title: TWS filter threshold (z-score or ratio)
avgTwsThresholdUp.description: If standard deviation is enabled, this is the maximum allowed z-score. Otherwise, it's the upper ratio threshold.

avgTwsThresholdDown.title: Lower TWS ratio threshold
avgTwsThresholdDown.description: Ignored if standard deviation is enabled.

useAvgTwaThreshold.title: Filter by TWA deviation from average
useAvgTwaThreshold.description: Enable filtering based on the average True Wind Angle over a time window.

avgTwaTimeWindow.title: TWA average time window (s)
avgTwaTimeWindow.description: Time window in seconds to calculate average TWA.

avgTwaThresholdUp.title: TWA filter threshold (z-score or ratio)
avgTwaThresholdUp.description: If standard deviation is enabled, this is the maximum allowed z-score. Otherwise, it's the upper ratio threshold.

avgTwaThresholdDown.title: Lower TWA ratio threshold
avgTwaThresholdDown.description: Ignored if standard deviation is enabled.
